title: Prayer for the Dead
description: JOHN BECKERleft the FBI because he was too good at his job. He could think like a killer. And he enjoyed the thrill of the hunt...too much.ROGER DYCEwas the serial killer whose twisted crimes would lure Becker back to his old profession. But this time, Becker is closer to his prey than ever before...Close enough to kill.
author: David Wiltse
